data.system_settings: Debian Stretch, Gnome 3 (Also seen on Windows 10 x64)
data.actual_result: The search changes to match only the characters up to the cursor
data.expected_result: The current active search keyword stays the same until you edit the text
data.short_description: Moving the cursor on slash commands arguments changes the search keyword
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any text channel - Use a slash command (/giphy, /tenor...) with any text as argument - Move the cursor back in the text (using arrow keys or click)
